changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout du module Legrand Télérupteur: Addition of the Legrand Télérupteur module
changelog.md.Ajout de la puissance pour le contacteur: Addition of power for the Legrand contactor
changelog.md.Ajout du binding (entre groupe ou module: Addition of the binding (between group or module
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur le bouton pou: Fixed a problem on the button to force the OTA update on certain module

index.md.Le plugin Zigbee permet de communiquer a: The Zigbee plugin allows you to communicate with most existing Zigbee equipment
index.md.Il se base sur le (super) projet Zigpy q: It is based on the (super) Zigpy project which is compatible with the following zigbee keys
index.md.Testé et validé par l'équipe Jeedom: Tested and validated by the Jeedom team
index.md.Il n'y a pas besoin d'avoir Deconz d'ins: There is no need to have Deconz installed
index.md.EZSP (clef basés sur un chipset Silicon: EZSP (key based on a Silicon Labs chipset
index.md.En cours de test par l'équipe Jeedom: Under test by the Jeedom team
index.md.Non testé par l'équipe Jeedom: Not tested by the Jeedom team
index.md.Non testé par l'équipe, marqué en expéri: Not tested by the team, marked in experimental at Zigpy
index.md.Après installation du plugin, il vous su: After installing the plugin, you just have to install the dependencies, select your type of key, the port (be careful only the type of deconz key supports the port in auto) and start the daemon
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi choisir le canal pour: You can also choose the channel for the zigbee
index.md.Tout changement de canal nécessite forcé: Any change of channel necessarily requires a restart of the daemon
index.md.Un changement de canal peut aussi nécess: A change of channel may also require reinclusion of certain modulus
index.md.Il est possible sur les clefs de type EZ: It is possible on EZSP type keys (Elelabs for example) and ZNP to make a backup of this one to restore it on another key
index.md.Sur les clefs de type EZXP (Elelabs) il: On EZXP type keys (Elelabs) it is only possible to make a single backup restore in all and for the life of the key
index.md.Le backup ne contient pas la liste des m: The backup does not contain the list of modules but only the basic information of the zigbee network, so it is not necessary to do it often, only one is enough because it does not move during the life of the key
index.md.Lors d'un backup ou d'une restauration l: During a backup or a restore the zigbee daemon (s) are stopped
index.md.Il est possible depuis Jeedom de mettre: It is possible from Jeedom to update the firmware of the Zigbee key (only for Elelabs for the moment
index.md.Le firmware étant vraiment très importan: The firmware is really very important in zigbee (it is he who manages the routing for example) it is important to update it
index.md.Lors d'une mise à jour du firmware le(s): During a firmware update the zigbee daemon (s) are stopped
index.md.Il est possible de mettre en place des p: It is possible to set up specific parameters for the zigbee sub-system (zigpy
index.md.Cette partie est vraiment réservé aux ex: This part is really reserved for experts and Jeedom does not provide a list of possible parameters (there are hundreds which depend on the type of key
index.md.Le champ prend en entrée du json exemple: The field takes as input from the json example
index.md.Lors de TOUTE demande de support si il y: During ANY support request if there is a configuration above, the support request will be automatically refused
index.md.L'inclusion est la partie la plus compli: Inclusion is the hardest part in Zigbee
index.md.Bien que simple l'opération est à faire: Although simple, the operation is often done several times
index.md.Coté plugin c'est facile il suffit de cl: On the plugin side, it's easy, just click on the "Include mode" button, once done you have 3 minutes to include your equipment
index.md.Coté équipement ca change en fonction du: Equipment side changes depending on the module, it is necessary to refer to the documentation of this one each time
index.md.Ne surtout pas oublier de faire une remi: Do not forget to do a reset of the module before any inclusion
index.md.Une fois inclus Jeedom doit reconnaitre: Once included Jeedom must automatically recognize your module (if this is not the case see next chapter) and therefore create the commands that go well
index.md.A noter qu'a cause de bug dans certain f: Note that due to a bug in certain firmware (Ikea, Sonoff ...) it is sometimes necessary to choose the type of module directly in the "Equipment" list then to save to have the correct commands
index.md.Vous avez dans l'onglet équipement les p: You have in the equipment tab the following parameters
index.md.identifiants unique de l'équipements, me: unique identifiers of the equipment, even during a reinclusion (or even if you change the type of zigbee key
index.md.Ne pas attendre le retour d'éxécution de: Do not wait for the return of execution of orders (faster but less reliable
index.md.n'attends pas la validation de clef pour: do not wait for the key validation to say that the command has been executed
index.md.Ca rend la main plus vite mais ne garant: It makes the hand faster but does not guarantee that everything went well
index.md.Dans l'onglet commande vous retrouvez le: In the command tab you will find the commands of your module (if it has been recognized
index.md.Le binding permet de lier 2 modules entr: The binding allows to link 2 modules between them directly (the orders do not go through Jeedom
index.md.Le lien se fait d'un cluster vers le mem: The link is made from a cluster to the same cluster of another module
index.md.Il faut toujours faire le lien depuis la: The link must always be made from the control (remote control type) to the actuator
index.md.Attention certain module ne sont pas com: Attention some module are not compatible with the binding or other (like the Ikea modules) only supports the binding of the command to a group (you must first make a group in which you must put the actuator
index.md.Pour les experts voici comment marche le: For the experts here is how the controls work
index.md.permet d'écrire la valeur d'un attribut: allows you to write the value of an attribute (be careful not all attributes can be changed) with
index.md.ici on va ecrire l'attribut dans l'endpo: here we will write the attribute in endpoint 1, incoming cluster
index.md.513, attribut 18 avec pour valeur celle: 513, attribute 18 with the value of the
index.md.permet d'éxecuter une commande server, a: allows to execute a server command, with
index.md.parametre dans le bonne ordre séparé par: parameter in the correct order separated by
index.md.Si votre module n'est pas reconnu par je: If your module is not recognized by jeedom (no command) but included then you must ask the Jeedom team to add it
index.md.L'équipe Jeedom se réserve le droit de r: The Jeedom team reserves the right to refuse any integration request it is always better to take an already compatible module
index.md.Pour cela il faut fournir les éléments s: For this, you must provide the following elements (any incomplete request will be refused without a response from the Jeedom team
index.md.Donner le modèle exacte de votre module: Give the exact model of your module (with a link to the sales page
index.md.Sur la page de l'équipement cliquer sur: On the equipment page, click on configuration then tab "Raw information" and send the content to the Jeedom team
index.md.Mettre le démon en debug (et le redémarr: Put the daemon in debug (and restart it), make actions on the equipment (if it is a temperature sensor, vary the temperature for example, if it is a valve, vary the setpoint ...) and send the zigbee debug log (be careful to take the zigbee and not the zigbeed
index.md.Touchlink ou Lightlink est une partie pa: Touchlink or Lightlink is a special part of the Zigbee which allows you to send management orders to a module if you are very close to it (50cm
index.md.Ca sert par exemple a faire un reset sur: It is used for example to make a reset on the bulbs that do not have a button
index.md.Cela concerne donc tous ce qui est ampou: This therefore concerns all that is Zigbee bulbs type Philips Hue, Ikea, Osram, Icasa ... and so on
index.md.Le principe est très simple pour pouvoir: The principle is very simple to be able to associate this type of module with a zigbee network, you must first do a reset
index.md.Ensuite lors du redémarrage le module va: Then when restarting the module will automatically try to associate with the first open Zigbee network it finds
index.md.C'est la partie compliqué (comme toujour: This is the complicated part (as always in Zigbee the hardest is the reset / association
index.md.Faire 5 ou 6 fois du on\/off rapidement,: Do the on / off 5 or 6 times quickly, the bulb normally flashes quickly at the end to signal that it is good (rarely works
index.md.Utiliser une télécommande zigbee et: Use a zigbee remote control and
index.md.appuyer sur en même temps le bouton ON e: press at the same time the ON and OFF button for 5 to 10 seconds near the powered bulb (beware of certain bulbs, you sometimes have to turn off / on the bulb just before) for Philips hue remote controls
index.md.appuyer sur le bouton reset (a côté de l: press the reset button (next to the battery) for 5 to 10 seconds near the powered bulb (beware of certain bulbs, you sometimes have to turn the bulb off / on just before) for Ikea remote controls
index.md.Pour les ampoules hue vous pouvez aussi: For the hue bulbs you can also include them on the hue bridge and then remove them from it
index.md.Les mises à jour OTA sont les mises à jo: The OTA updates are the updates of the firmware of the modules, it takes very very very long (several hours) but allows to have less worries in general
index.md.Pour pouvoir mettre à jour un module il: To be able to update a module, the manufacturer must communicate the firmware
index.md.Pour Ikea et Ledavance pas de soucis c'e: For Ikea and Ledavance no worries it is provided online directly by Ikea, the plugin will pick it up directly from them
index.md.le fabricant fournis desfois officieusem: the manufacturer sometimes unofficially provides an update
index.md.Pour tous les autres il n'y a pas possib: For all the others there is no possibility to update the module by the plugin
index.md.Pour activer les mises jour OTA il suffi: To activate OTA updates, just check the box in the plugin configuration then save then click on the button to update the OTA files
index.md.Ensuite plus qu'à redémarrer le(s) démon: Then just restart the zigbee demon (s)
index.md.Les mises à jour se lancent si il y en a: The updates are launched if there is one and after the module asks if there is one (you can force this in the action tab on the configuration of the module / node
index.md.Il n'y a malheureusement pas d'indicateu: Unfortunately, there is no simple indicator to see the progress of the update, the only solution is to go to the zigbee_X log (if the log is in debug) and look for ota and there you can see if a module updates itself with logs of the type
index.md.Conseil pour fiabiliser le réseaux zigbe: Advice to make zigbee networks more reliable
index.md.Pour avoir un réseau zigbee fiable il es: To have a reliable zigbee network, it is more than recommended to have at least 3 router modules permanently powered and to avoid unplugging them
index.md.En effet lors de nos tests nous avons re: Indeed during our tests we noticed a big improvement in the reliability and the resilience of the zigbee network when adding the router module
index.md.Il est d'ailleurs conseillé de les inclu: It is also advisable to include them first (otherwise it will take between 24 to 48 hours for the end device [non-router module] to find out
index.md.Autre point important il se peut lors de: Another important point it is possible during the removal of a router module that part of the end device [non-router module] is lost for a longer or shorter time (ten hours or more), or even definitively and that you have to reinclude them
index.md.Malheureusement l'équipe Jeedom ne peux: Unfortunately the Jeedom team can not do anything about it.It is specific to the end device [non router module] depending on how the manufacturer configured it (and not to the Jeedom plugin which absolutely does not take care of the routing part
index.md.Le graphique du réseaux Zigbee est là à: The graph of the Zigbee networks is for information only and is based on the neighbors that the modules declare to have, so it is not necessarily the real routing but the possible routings
index.md.Autre point important les gateway zigbee: Another important point: zigbee gateways on wifi are less reliable than zigbee gateaways on USB, it's obvious but we prefer to remind you here it is therefore strongly recommended to use USB gateways
index.md.Le LQI ou le RSSI est à N\/A: LQI or RSSI is N / A
index.md.C'est normalement suite à un redémarrage: It is normally following a restart of the Zigbee networks the values are emptied, it is necessary to wait for the module to reactivate so that the values return
index.md.J'ai des soucis d'inclusion ou des erre: I have inclusion issues or errors in the type logs
index.md.Essayer de supprimer la rallonge USB si: Try to remove the USB extension if you have one or change it or put one in if you don't have one
index.md.J'ai des erreurs \"can not send to devic: I have "can not send to device" or "send error" or "Message send failure" errors
index.md.Malheureusement c'est très compliqué à c: Unfortunately it is very complicated to correct, it is usually due to a routing problem (the routing is more or less fixed in zigbee and not symmetrical
index.md.le module peut utiliser une route différ: the module can use a different route to answer you than the one used to talk to it
index.md.Souvent l'arrêt électrique (retrait des: Often the electrical shutdown (removing the batteries for example) and resetting the current (or replacing the batteries) is enough to resolve the problem
index.md.J'ai des erreurs bizarres sur des module: I have weird errors on stacked modules or inclusion issues
index.md.Nous avons remarqué qu'une bonne partie: We noticed that a good part of the zigbee problems on battery modules are due to the batteries (or problems of resetting the modules before inclusion
index.md.Même si celle-ci semble neuves il est co: Even if it seems new, it is advisable to test with others to be sure
index.md.J'ai des soucis de mise à jour des valeu: I have concerns updating the values of the equipment
index.md.c'est un \"vieux module\" en ZLL (voir c: it is an "old module" in ZLL (see configuration of the Jeedom equipment indicates whether it is ZHA or ZLL), in this case you absolutely need a "Refresh" command for you or Jeedom to force an update values
index.md.Si vous ne l'avez pas alors il faut cont: If you don't have it then you have to contact support so that it can be added to the next stable version
index.md.Une fois sortie il vous faudra cliquer s: Once exited you will have to click on "recreate orders" without deleting
index.md.le module est en ZHA, alors c'est un sou: the module is in ZHA, so it's a concern of inclusion
index.md.dans l'onglet action de la configuration: in the action tab of the equipment configuration you have a reset button to force post inclusion actions, remember to keep the module awake if it is on battery
